er.name: Verb of Group I
er.description: French verbs in this group can be recognized by the -er ending. They are the most numerous, and the easiest to conjucate.

ir.name: Verb of Group II
ir.description: French verbs in this group can be recognized by the -ir ending.

re.name: Verb of Group III
re.description: French verbs in this group can be recognized by the -re ending. Many irregular verbs also belong to this group.

unknown.name: Unknown Word
unknown.description: This is not a known verb, but it may be a verb derivative form. Please specify the verb with the -er, -ir or -re ending.

verification: There is no record of this word in the Verbatim database. This program is useful only for the most common verbs. Please check in a dictionnary.
This is a known French verb.

regularity.name: Regular
regularity.description: It is a regular verb and the standard conjugaion for this group will be applied.

regularity.name: Irregular
regularity.description: Pay attention because there are irregularities in the conjugation.
